item.title: Need Help With a Code, Very Simple
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Inmate, post:5, topic:128468”]use ( and ) instead of < and > ?
Noob much?[/quote]

Its his compiler? noob much - You

anyway back on subject

use this instead

if (command.startsWith("adminhangout") && playerRights >= 2)) { teleportToX = 2834; teleportToY = 3335; sendMessage("Welcome to The Admin Hangout!!"); }

You missed out a ) at the last bit on the top

that should work

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With a Code, Very Simple
item.dc:creator: @Rshacker112 Rshacker112
item.description:
@Rshacker112 wrote:

Ok so I want to make a place where my admins can chill and ge away from all those noobs annoying us right?
Well I made a command (my first one, yay) Called ::AdminHangout. I added the whole thing to make it admin only but it doesnt work…
Here’s the code that I have

if (command.startsWith("Admin Hangout") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = 2834; teleportToY = 3335; sendMessage("Welcome to The Admin Hangout!!"); }
Please point out anything wrong with it…

Read full topic
